__e: Going after Lexi isn't really a possibility right now.
- Ben! - We don't know what Lexi is. We don't know how she got this way.
So maybe Lexi's here to help me deliver this.
We're gonna find Jeannie. We're gonna find Matt and then Ben and Lexi and Anne. And then we're gonna take the Espheni out permanen...

Because when Ben came and told us about Lexi and said that there was no trail to follow, maybe I was looking for a reason to move on so that our family drama didn't wreak havoc on everybody and everything for once!
It took me months to find Lexi.
